# AudioFileStreamClose(_:)

**Function**

Closes and deallocates the specified audio file stream parser.

## Declaration

```swift
func AudioFileStreamClose(_ inAudioFileStream: AudioFileStreamID) -> OSStatus
```

## Parameters

- **inAudioFileStream**: The ID of the parser you wish to close. The parser ID is returned by the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioFileStreamOpen(_:_:_:_:_:)] function.

## Return Value

A result code. See Result Codes.

## Related Documentation

- **AudioFileStreamOpen(_:_:_:_:_:)**: Creates and opens a new audio file stream parser.
